name: SOCIB Data Catalog
description: User-friendly access point for oceanographic data from the Balearic Islands Coastal Observing and Forecasting System (SOCIB) Metocean Data Repository. Facilitates discovery, visualization, and download of oceanographic data, and demonstrates SOCIB API capabilities.
owner_name: ICTS SOCIB (Balearic Islands Coastal Observing and Forecasting System)
